text:
Ashley had so much information for us leading up to our stay and in the house. She should get a cut from the local restaurants because we tried all of her suggestions and they were great. 

Casa SoCo is in a great location within walking distance of lots of restaurants and boutiques. It's also a quick drive to Zilker Park which was great for our little ones as they have a huge playground, but would be nice for outdoor minded adults too.  The house is also on a dead end street, which provided the opportunity for lots of outdoor play for our toddlers without much worry.

The house is great and is just as you see it in the pictures. We even had local friends and family over so we could catch up with everyone in one place and there was plenty of room for "entertaining" (picking up BBQ from just down the street).

Would highly recommend this spot for both a family and
title: Modern, Urban Oasis for 8 SoCo/SoFi
